abstract: Italy's highest court postpones by two days ruling on whether to uphold convictions of Amanda Knox and Raffaele Sollecito for 2007 murder of Meredith Kercher.
lead_paragraph: A hearing on whether the court should uphold the murder convictions of Ms. Knox and her Italian former boyfriend went slowly, forcing the judges to postpone a decision until Friday.

headline.main: Italian Court Postpones Ruling in Amanda Knox Case
headline.print_headline: Europe; Italy: Ruling Delayed in American’s Case

snippet: A hearing on whether the court should uphold the murder convictions of Ms. Knox and her Italian former boyfriend went slowly, forcing the judges to postpone a decision until Friday.
